> Waifu Dai apologizes for the corrupted update :3

## 1.3.34
- Reverted shrinking app build size.

## 1.3.33
- Tried to fix launcher issues.
- Shrunk app build size. (Over 50% decreased, APK now 4~5 MB)

## 1.3.30
- Fixed malfunctioning RA links.

## 1.3.29
- Improved several details.
- Improved accuracy of RetroAchievements.
- Added automatic platforms update on startup.

## 1.3.28
 - Fixed an RSS widget bug.
 - Updated IGDB token.

## 1.3.27
 - Another patch for RAWeb 2.0.0.

###  1.3 (The infrastructural update)
Including below updates:
- [DSESS](https://github.com/magneticchen/Daijishou/blob/main/DSESS.md) (Daijishou Search Engine Scraper Syntax).
- Faster, better and unified bitmap cache.
- Improved navigation and animations.
- Faster image loading and UIs.
- Android lifecycle improvements.
- New pin apps widgets and faster widgets page.
- Better apps page and kiosk mode.
- Detect players on device or bring to play store when not exists.
- Optimized scrapers images size.
- Better memory management.
- Better hotkey framework.
- New languages.
- And various bugs fixes and details update. (Have about 17,000~ additions and 10,000~ deletions.)

### Languages List

1. English
2. Portuguese
3. Taiwanese mandarin
4. Japanese
5. French
6. Chinese
7. Italian
